segment.source: By default, there will be borders around your application.
segment.target: By default, there will be borders around your application.

segment.source: To remove these borders and be able to use the full height and width of the screen, you can turn off automatic scaling.

segment.source: By default, your application will be scaled to 200% if you are using XAML or 150% for HTML.
